title: MU:Re7.2.C.Ia
body/value: Analyze aurally the elements of music (including form) of musical works, relating them to style, mood, and context, and describe how the analysis provides models for personal growth as composer, performer, and/or listener.

title: MU:Re7.2.C.IIa
body/value: Analyze aurally and/or by reading the scores of musical works the elements of music (including form ) , compositional techniques and procedures , relating them to style, mood, and context; and explain how the analysis provides models for personal growth as composer, performer, and/or listener.

title: MU:Re7.2.C.IIIa
body/value: Analyze aurally and/or by reading the scores of musical works the elements of music (including form), compositional techniques and procedures, relating them to aesthetic effectiveness , style, mood, and context; and explain how the analysis provides models for personal growth as composer, performer, and/or listener.

title: MU:Re8.1.C.Ia

body/value: Develop, justify and defend interpretations of varied works, demonstrating an understanding of the composers’ intent by citing the use of elements of music (including form), compositional techniques, and the style/genre and context of each work.
